title: Personal Page
text:
Experienced professional in Financial Planning & Analysis roles within large and fast-paced corporations. Release-planning specialist trained in BI development, data analysis, and large experience in financial reporting. Recently graduated in Data Analytics for Business Postgraduate diploma at St. Clair College (ON, Canada) to complement my background
I am an analytical and driven person with a natural passion for learning new data tools and processes. Experienced in data analysis, data visualization and KPI/metrics visualization, with knowledge in Python, R, SQL, Tableau, Power BI, and large experience in QlikView and Qlik Sense. Aside from that, knowledge of Oracle Hyperion Planning, HFM and SmartView tools for advanced reporting and pulling data.
I am an enthusiastic business partner and passionate about the highest quality of work and positive environments. Creative solutions architect with real-time problem-solving flexibility. Proven ability to learn quickly and adapt to new situations.
On this site I keep updated my curriculum, as well you can reach my LinkedIn.
















Data Analytics for Business 

St. Clair College | May 2023  Windsor, ON. Canada

MBA, Master of Business Administration 

UEM - UNAB | Jul 2020 Madrid, Spain - Santiago, Chile

Bachelor Business Administration 

UNAB (Universidad Andres Bello) | Jul 2013  Santiago, Chile

Computer Science & Management Control Engineer 

UDP (Universidad Diego Portales) | Dec 2004  Santiago, Chile

title: About
text:
Develop Transforming large amounts of data in ways that are universally understandable or easy to interpret and spot patterns, trends and correlations. Build reports and dashboards with the help of Qlik and other reporting tools
Maintenance/Configuration Qlikview Server, automatized ETL



Hyperion Planning: Collection of data and financial consolidation. Data entry, analysis, and reporting, including personalizing data entry forms
Smartview for MS Office: Experienced skills for reporting and querys. Design worksheets in Microsoft Excel to enter, format, analyze, and report on data
HFM: Hyperion Financial Management. Consolidate and report financial results, meet global regulatory requirements, reduce the cost of compliance, and deliver confidence in the numbers



MS Excel / MS Access: Performing data analysis, including PowerQuery. Ability to provide analysis and operational insights
Python: Analyzing data to provide key insights and solve business challenges. Extract, integrate and analyze multiple disparate data sources from a variety of systems, such as structured and unstructured data.Mine data to uncover patterns and to identify business trends and new opportunities for using analytics
R: Explore data, apply statistics functions
SQL: Relational databases, data integration. Ensuring the integrity of the data

title: About
text:

title: About
text:
Awards & Recognition
Collaboration Award: Global recognition conferred among all network financial teams. This Award was given for my contributions and share all my findings with my colleagues and other regional teams
